bba.model

Class BitBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • bba.model.BitBlock

  • public class BitBlock
extends java.lang.Object
    BitBlock type, a visual representation of SourceCode. The BitBlock is comprised of colored pixels, a pixel for each literal and expression. "Needs to produce a BitBlocks"
    Author:
    Triston Scallan

      • getDimension

        public int[] getDimension()
        Calculates the dimensions of the BitBlock based on the size of this.pixelList.

        NOTE: If the returned value's r == 0, then the final row should be filled, otherwise the final row should have "r" many pixels.

        x is width, y is height, r is remainder.

        Returns:
        an integer array of {x, y, r}. result would display x pixels to a row, y total rows, and r added to the y-th row
